languages.text: "Капитан "Бессердечного" горячо приветствует Вашу Светлость и заверяет, что старательно исполняет свой долг — вверенный ему торговый маршрут в безопасности, происшествий нет".

"The captain of the Heartless offers his sincere greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures us that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which she is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."
languages.original_text: "Капитан "Бессердечного" горячо приветствует Вашу Светлость и заверяет, что старательно исполняет свой долг — вверенный ему торговый маршрут в безопасности, происшествий нет".

traits.locale_text: "The captain of the Heartless offers his hearty greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which the Heartless is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."

"The captain of the Heartless offers his hearty greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which the Heartless is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."

"The captain of the Heartless offers his sincere greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures us that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which she is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."

languages.text: 「ハートレスの船長は閣下に心からの挨拶を送り、船は任務を全うしていることを保証します。割り当てられた交易ルートは安全であり、クルーからの問題報告はありません」
languages.original_text: "The captain of the Heartless offers his sincere greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures us that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which she is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."

traits.locale_text: 「ハートレスの船長は閣下に心からの挨拶を送り、船は任務を全うしていることを保証します。割り当てられた交易ルートは安全であり、クルーからの問題報告はありません」

languages.text: "Taşkalp'in kaptanı, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne en içten selamlarını sunup geminin vazifesini büyük bir özenle yerine getirdiği konusunda teminatta bulunuyor. Geminin görevlendirildiği ticaret rotası güvende ve mürettebat herhangi bir hadise rapor etmiyor."
languages.original_text: "The captain of the Heartless offers his sincere greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures us that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which she is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."

traits.locale_text: "Taşkalp'in kaptanı, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne en içten selamlarını sunup geminin vazifesini büyük bir özenle yerine getirdiği konusunda teminatta bulunuyor. Geminin görevlendirildiği ticaret rotası güvende ve mürettebat herhangi bir hadise rapor etmiyor."

languages.text: «El capitán de la Desalmada le saluda, mi{mf|lord|lady}, y le asegura que la nave realiza sus funciones con diligencia impecable. La ruta comercial a la que se ha asignado la nave es segura, por lo que no hay incidencias de las que informar».
languages.original_text: "The captain of the Heartless offers his sincere greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures us that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which she is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."

traits.locale_text: «El capitán de la Desalmada le saluda, mi{mf|lord|lady}, y le asegura que la nave realiza sus funciones con diligencia impecable. La ruta comercial a la que se ha asignado la nave es segura, por lo que no hay incidencias de las que informar».

languages.text: “无心号的舰长向您致以最诚挚的问候，大人。他向我们保证，他与全体船员会尽其所能履行职责。目前，这艘船的贸易路线很安全，船员也没有报告任何事故。”
languages.original_text: "The captain of the Heartless offers his sincere greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures us that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which she is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."

traits.locale_text: “无心号的舰长向您致以最诚挚的问候，大人。他向我们保证，他与全体船员会尽其所能履行职责。目前，这艘船的贸易路线很安全，船员也没有报告任何事故。”

languages.text: "Der Captain der Heartless übermittelt Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} aufrichtige Grüße und versichert uns, dass sein Schiff seiner Pflicht gewissenhaft nachgehen wird ... die Handelsroute, der es zugeteilt wurde, ist sicher, und die Crew meldet keinerlei Zwischenfälle."
languages.original_text: "The captain of the Heartless offers his sincere greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures us that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which she is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."

traits.locale_text: "Der Captain der Heartless übermittelt Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} aufrichtige Grüße und versichert uns, dass sein Schiff seiner Pflicht gewissenhaft nachgehen wird ... die Handelsroute, der es zugeteilt wurde, ist sicher, und die Crew meldet keinerlei Zwischenfälle."

languages.text: « Le capitaine du Sans-Cœur adresse ses salutations les plus respectueuses et tient à informer Votre Seigneurie que le vaisseau effectue son devoir avec diligence. Les routes commerciales qui lui ont été confiées sont désormais sécurisées et l'équipage confirme l'absence de tout incident. »
languages.original_text: "The captain of the Heartless offers his sincere greetings to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and assures us that the ship performs her duty with all due diligence — the trade route to which she is assigned is secure, and the crew has no incidents to report."

traits.locale_text: « Le capitaine du Sans-Cœur adresse ses salutations les plus respectueuses et tient à informer Votre Seigneurie que le vaisseau effectue son devoir avec diligence. Les routes commerciales qui lui ont été confiées sont désormais sécurisées et l'équipage confirme l'absence de tout incident. »
